short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch youtube videos taking up the maximum space of your browser, without hiding the tabs, the desktop or the window bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you use youtube to watch tutorials continuously, this extension is for you.

The purpose of this extension is that people who usually follow tutorials in full screen and have to be using an application to practice what they learn, can have an extra option for the size of their player.

When we want to see a video or a playlist in full screen, it can be achieved by simply pressing the refresh screen button in your browser, this will automatically change the interface and the size of the video.
